cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.DB

Reasoning: The paper discusses the evaluation of document clustering, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also discusses the use of ad hoc information retrieval, which is a subfield of information retrieval. The paper uses measures of cluster quality, which are commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and data mining (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the application of the approach to any clustering evaluation, which is relevant to database systems (cs.DB).
